head.supplied: No 1056 ¶ Baron Ferd. von Mueller Mr F.D.H. ¶ Director ¶ Melbourne ¶ 22 September 73...

div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: MS is a letter-book copy of donation certificate. No 1056

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Herrn Baron Ferd. von Müller Mr d. F.D.H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: durch Vermittlung des zum G. A. Lambert in Mainz bestehend der "Fragmenta Phytographiae Australiae."

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Mit besonderem […]vollsten Grusse […] und freu. Theilnahme an allen […] […] und beglückten Wirksamkeit!

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Baron Ferd. von Mueller Mr F.D.H.
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: through the agency of G. A. Lambert in Mainz consisting of the "Fragmenta Phytographiae Australiae"

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: With particular […] greetings […] and […] […] and kindly participation in all […] […] and successful activity.
